descriptionHtml:
This Mod is a mixture of the best components from diverse ENBs.

(((((((((((( newest ENB versionv0.254 required ! ))))))))))))))))

HIGH END COMPUTER SYSTEM RECOMMENDED ! MIN GTX 760 or similar Amd Card REQUIRED !!!

-Make safety copies of changed data in the skyrim folder !

Installation : Copy files from downloadet folder and put them in theSkyrim folder (where TESV.exe is)

Mods you HAVE to install for the best result:

-Real Vision ENB

-Realistic Lighting Without Post-Processing
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4323/? tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D4323&pUp=1

-Realistic Water Two http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?

-SkyRealism Grass
/>http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25370/?

-Better Rocks and Mountains

-Skyrim 2K Textures

-Climates of Tamriel

>-Claralux more and brighter lights

>-Immersive Saturation Boost (very important If you installed Realistic Lighting Without Post-Processing !)

-Static Mesh Improvement Mod
author: TesEnhancer
